 1998-03491998-03-120FAIT,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority for the Minister of Foreign Affairs (a) to sign the ACTS OF THE XVIIth CONGRESS OF THE POSTAL UNION OF THE AMERICAS, SPAIN AND PORTUGAL, MONTEVIDEO (1998), or (b) to issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing two officials with the Canada Post Corporation to sign the Acts on behalf of Canada.
